uvi.description:
phy: phy-mtk-tphy: Fix some resource leaks in mtk_phy_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.46 by commit 9a17907946232d01aa2ec109da5f93b8d31dd425. For more details please see the references link.
